lead_paragraph: While the rest of us were wondering how "Back to the Future" might have turned out if it had starred Eric Stoltz instead of Michael J. Fox, "Saturday Night Live" was contemplating even more esoteric casting possibilities and realizing that maybe history turned out for the best.
snippet: The cast of "Saturday Night Live" reveals unseen screen tests from some other famous "Back to the Future" hopefuls.

headline.main: Not-So-Great Scott: More Alternate Realities for 'Back to the Future'

abstract: The cast of "Saturday Night Live" reveals unseen screen tests from some other famous "Back to the Future" hopefuls.
